user_profile.name: Sofia JimÃ©nez
user_profile.description: Sofia JimÃ©nez is a 68-year-old retired architect from Argentina, known for her analytical mind and advanced tech skills. With a very reserved demeanor, she prefers indirect communication, especially in high-pressure professional settings. Now looking to rent an apartment in a vibrant urban area, Sofia aims to leverage her adaptable nature and visual learning style to find a space that matches her active lifestyle while balancing her intuitive decision-making against her moderate social pressures.
